source: Iowa Department of Veterans Affairs, Iowa Workforce Development, Military.com, Scott County Veterans Services

resources.name: Iowa Department of Veterans Affairs (IDVA)
resources.description: State agency providing comprehensive veteran benefits, housing assistance, employment services, and support programs

resources.name: Iowa 211
resources.description: Free, confidential information and referrals for community resources including housing, food, health, employment, and veteran services

resources.name: Iowa County Veterans Services Offices
resources.description: 99 County Veterans Services offices with accredited County Veteran Services Officers providing local veteran support and benefits assistance

resources.name: Home Base Iowa - Iowa Workforce Development
resources.description: Program bringing together Iowa businesses with qualified veterans looking for career opportunities and employment services

resources.name: Iowa Workforce Development - Veteran Employment Services
resources.description: 15 regional workforce centers with staff coordinating veteran-specific employment and career services

resources.name: Scott County Veterans Services
resources.description: County veterans services office providing local veteran support and benefits assistance

resources.name: Military Homeownership Assistance Grant
resources.description: $5,000 grant available to veterans purchasing a home in Iowa, administered by IDVA

resources.name: Emergency Housing Repairs Program
resources.description: Iowa funds emergency housing repairs up to $3,000 in a 12-month period for qualifying veterans

resources.name: Iowa Veterans Unemployment Assistance
resources.description: Assistance for unemployment or underemployment due to service-related causes, providing up to $3,000 per 12 months ($6,000 lifetime max)

resources.name: Veterans Crisis Line
resources.description: 24/7 free confidential crisis support for veterans and families experiencing mental health crises, PTSD, suicidal thoughts

resources.name: Iowa Health & Wellness Services for Veterans
resources.description: Assistance with vision, hearing, dental care, durable medical equipment, and prescription drugs for qualifying veterans

additional_resources.home_base_iowa: https://dva.iowa.gov/ - Jobs and business connections for veterans
additional_resources.unemployment_assistance: Up to $3,000 per 12 months, $6,000 lifetime maximum
additional_resources.va_benefits: https://www.va.gov/ - Comprehensive VA benefits and healthcare

notes: Iowa has 99 County Veterans Services offices providing local access to support. Call your local county office or contact IDVA for state-specific benefits. Home Base Iowa program connects veterans with employment opportunities.
